name: The Ruined Egg Temple
description:
A simple platformer where you collect eggs in hopes of hitting the quickest time possible, built across 9 days as a submission for The Great Spring Game Jam 2021 (Go easy on me, this is my first ever Jam!)

Made using Phaser 3 (https://phaser.io/phaser3) 

Maps built using Tiled (https://www.mapeditor.org)

Game source has been uploaded to GitHub if curious (https://github.com/GitLomaz/ruined-egg-temple)

Or.. come say "Hi" to me on my discord, I'm always looking for people to chat and work with! (https://discord.gg/k3kn93J7w4)
